paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on TTR variants, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

patients.phenotype: severe form of familial amyloid polyneuropathy (FAP) with cardiac involvement

individual_records.phenotype_details: severe form of FAP with cardiac involvement
individual_records.evidence_sentence: In particular, a severe form of FAP, characterized by early-onset and rapid progressive amyloidosis with severe cardiac involvement (FAC), results from amyloid deposits in the heart parenchyma of a number of mutants, particularly the highly amyloidogenic Leu55Pro (L55P) mutant.

functional_data.summary: The L55P variant is associated with a compromised binding pocket that alters the binding of stabilizers, leaving protein stability unaffected by the interaction.

variants.additional_notes: The L55P variant is known to be highly amyloidogenic.
key_quotes: In particular, a severe form of FAP, characterized by early-onset and rapid progressive amyloidosis with severe cardiac involvement (FAC), results from amyloid deposits in the heart parenchyma of a number of mutants, particularly the highly amyloidogenic Leu55Pro (L55P) mutant.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the TTR variant L55P was extracted from the main text.
